name: One-D Runner
description:
A one dimensional endless runner game, made in one day.

There are territories of different factions. Each territory may contain residents of the faction. If your alignment matches, you can recruit them. If it does not, they will harm you on contact. 

You can choose to betray a faction if it proves to be more beneficial. However, your current recruits will not welcome this decision. So, choose wisely.

Have fun!
